title: Project: Wind Charge Demo
introduction:
The new Breeze mob is a new mob that will be added in the 1.21 update, and comes with a new item called Wind Charge. This item allows the Breeze to charge up and release a powerful gust of wind that can push entities and items away.

Right now, this feature is only available in the beta version of Minecraft Java, and we have created a demo to showcase the Wind Charge in action.

content.text: Since this is just a demo, there's no method to obtain this item in Survival mode. However, you can use the /give command or switch to Creative mode to obtain it.
The Wind Charge release a gust of wind that can push and damage entities
It can also give you a powerful boost!
You can use it to get across large gaps or to reach high places.
